Unitron:



Unitron's targeting computer got a lock on his target.  The Standing Stones.  
Also known as Stonehenge.  Unitron would change history.  How much of an 
impact it would make, he did not know.  But he would try and change time.


Launching two missiles, one from each wing, he pulled up, tracking them with 
his radar systems.  He heard them explode, disappearing from his radar 
system.  He swerved around in a 'U' shaped turn, ready to scrutinize the 
damage.

(I don't know how to post the damage for this, if I can, or what.  So, could 
Zardus or JP do it?)
